Blog CMS

Site Settings

Basic Settings

Header Menu

Tip: Use page titles or custom menu names. First item links to home (/).

Footer Links

Tip: Use page dropdown to add pages, or add custom links manually. Use relative paths like /pages/about for internal pages.

Social Media Links

Hero Section

Comments Settings

When enabled, comments can be posted on posts. Individual posts can also have comments disabled.

Theme Colors

Custom Scripts & CSS

Scripts will be added in the <head> section

Scripts will be added before the closing </body> tag

CSS will be added in a <style> tag in the <head> section

CSS will be added in a <style> tag before the closing </body> tag
